definition: to request sb to do sth/please!
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee

sentences.english: Leonard: Oh, come on. This is stupid.
Blade please chicken rice seed seeking from waterway escorted out of the city of hu pictureque method.
sentences.chinese: 刀锋拜托鸡饭仔寻求从水路护送胡畔出城之法。

sentences.english: Please stop talking about your problems.
D. I know I can count on you.
Joey: Come on. This guy's great.
sentences.chinese: 拜托，这个男人真的很棒。

sentences.english: So he called a friend in California to ask for a reference on a responsible hit man.
sentences.chinese: 于是他拜托在加利福尼亚的朋友寻找一个可靠的杀手。

sentences.english: Sheldon: Come on. Who hasn't seen this differential below "here I sit, broken-hearted"?
sentences.chinese: 拜托。这微分谁没见过啊？我真是心碎。

sentences.english: Christine, don't be ridiculous. I do have other interests.
sentences.chinese: 老姐，拜托，我有别的兴趣。

sentences.english: SunQiMing come on them, says he is serious this time.
sentences.chinese: 孙启鸣拜托他们，说自己这次是认真的。

sentences.english: Daniel:Mom, help me with the bowls, please! I can't hold them.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈，拜托帮我拿一下碗，我抓不住了。

sentences.english: Please, I don't have time to hold hands.
sentences.chinese: 拜托，我可没有握手寒喧的时间。

sentences.english: Would you be kind enough to take a message to him?
Caught dead? Ah, come on. You can have a try.
sentences.chinese: 献丑？啊，拜托。你可以试一试嘛。

sentences.english: Prince Ohcome on, sourpuss, get up and dancewithme.
sentences.chinese: 普林斯噢，拜托，别老是绷着个脸，起来和我跳支舞。

sentences.english: Come on, Timon. Anything we can do?
sentences.chinese: 拜托，丁满我们能帮忙吗？

definition: to help/to do a favor/(Shanghainese) Come on!/Give me a break!
unworthy/to let down/I'm sorry/excuse me/pardon me/if you please/sorry? (please repeat)
to feel embarrassed/to find it embarrassing/to be sorry (for inconveniencing sb)
to let sb down/to be unfair/I'm sorry/pardon me (formal)
to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
